name: GameJam2021 by Arzen
description:
An Idea for the GMTK Game jam 2021

A platformer game in which you control one character and multiple Elemental spirit to Clear worlds from mysterious dark crystals

(or at least that i try to XD)

for completiones there were supose to be 150 shards and 10 Dark Crystals... but there is a bug that Restore objects that are already pick up
